thread.title: College roundup: UVM drops season opener
thread.title_full: College roundup: UVM drops season opener

title: College roundup: UVM drops season opener
text:
College roundup: UVM drops season opener   11:20 p.m. EDT October 2, 2015 Catamounts goalie Madison Litchfield (30) stands on the blue line during the player introductions before the start of the women's hockey game between the Colgate Raiders and the Vermont Catamounts at Gutterson Field house last season. (Photo: Free Press File) 
Madison Hutchinson had a goal and an assist as the visiting Bemidji State Beavers used two first period goals to defeat the University of Vermont women’s ice hockey team to open the season on Friday night at Gutterson Fieldhouse. 
Emma Terres scored the other Beavers goal (2-0-1) and Brittni Mowat had 11 saves. 
Bridget Baker scored for the Catamounts (0-1) and Madison Litchfield stopped 31 shots. 
COLLEGE FIELD HOCKEY 
• Albany 3, Vermont 1: Vermont dropped its America East opener on Friday, falling to visiting Albany. 
Lauren Tucker scored the lone goal for the Catamounts (2-9) and Lena Benwood made 10 saves. 
Paula Heuser had two goals for the Great Danes (8-1) and Liza Morgan also tallied.  //bfpne.ws/1L9C9GG TOP VIDEOS
